name: Of Slime And Sandwiches
description:
'Of Slime And Sandwiches' was a collaborative project made over several discord calls with friends.

The plot, characters, artwork and other aspects were all decided on the spot during those calls, and the result was this: a masterpiece for the ages.

STORY:

Our protagonist Lavi wakes up one day wanting to help out his mom with her restaurant. However, with a pet slime and a deer boy by his side, he ends up uncovering the truth behind the 'Slime Sandwiches' that have shaken up the culinary world... 

CHARACTERS:

Lavi:

The protagonist of this story.  Just wants to be normal.

Slimecat:

Showed up one day and never left. An icon and legend.

                                                                           Javen:

                                                  The raddest deer boy in town. Really, really cool.

                                                                   Regular Cube:

                                                                   A cube that is regular.


THE TEAM:

Marie: Art and writing, designer of the iconic Slimecat. Check out her comic!

Jesse-James Cambridge: Art and writing, designer of the Cubes. @extinctionsoc

Nevi: Art and writing, designer of Lavi and the final boss. @Blizzaraga

Jojo: Art and writing, designer  of the coolest deer ever. @Jojo.miniatures

Meiri: Directed the project and did the RPG Maker magic, writing for the early game, designed Nei. I make games.

The game's title screen, game over screen and ending screen were collaborative pieces that most of the team worked on.

MISC:
Estimated playtime: 1-2 hours
Use arrow keys to move, ESC to open menu.
HINT: Hold 'Ctrl' to speed up battles, 'Space' to speed up events
